title: Social Event Discovery – Personalized Recommendations Based on User Interests
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to suggest social events based on my interests, so that I can stay engaged with my community and participate in family activities without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Scheduled Reminders for Family Check-Ins
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to send me scheduled reminders for regular check-ins with my family so that I can maintain my social connections without feeling monitored.

title: Cognitive Engagement Games
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want personalized cognitive stimulation games that challenge my brain and keep me sharp, so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Family and Caregiver Connection – Emergency Alerts Sent to Designated Contacts
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want to have emergency alerts sent to my family and caregivers so that I can feel secure knowing that help can be notified quickly without feeling monitored.

title: Support for Social Networks – Facilitation of New Friendships Through Common Interests
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to help me connect with others who share my interests in cycling and photography so that I can build new friendships and continue to engage in family activities without feeling monitored.

title: Collection of User Preferences for Social Activities
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to understand my preferences for social activities so that I can receive tailored event suggestions that help me stay engaged without feeling overwhelmed.

title: Cognitive Engagement Reminders
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want timely reminders for my scheduled cognitive stimulation activities so that I can maintain my cognitive abilities without feeling monitored.

title: Crisis Response Mechanism - Pre-set Alerts to Family Members in Case of Crises
summary: As an active retiree with early-stage cognitive concerns, I want ALFRED to send pre-set alerts to my family members in case of emergencies so that I can feel secure and maintain my independence without feeling monitored.
